title: What happened to Ap Tristana?
body:
I tried her today and did fine, ended up having to switch over to ad because we had a troll, and needed more dps, but until i did so i was a comfortable 7/4. 

Thoughts anyone?

replies.body: They stated openly that they hated it, so they got rid of it with the rework.

- Lower Rocket jump damage (.5 AP ratio from old .8 ratio)
- FAR lower E damage (both base damages and ratio)
- E damage triggers as physical now (Magic pen bonuses won't work with it)
- E has a much higher mana cost
- R damage lower (1.0 ratio from 1.5)

Basically all magic damage was gutted, and the mixed damage (W and R are magic, E is physical) means penetration is hard to itemize, so it falls off *very* hard as the game goes on. Yea, you can make AP trist win a game. You can make AP zed win a game too. Sorry, but AP trist was gutted, plain and simple.
Used to work many years ago, now it's too damn situational that most of the time it's not worth it.
